     <h1>

      </span>

      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21975666">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21975666">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21975666">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21975666">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>

           </a>

            kcannon@muhlenberg.edu

          <div id="boxatt21975666" class="boxatt">

       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21975668">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21975668">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21975668">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           U.S. Government Data on Careers
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21975668">
          <div id="boxatt21975668" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25440157">
              <a id="link_25440157" href="http://www.bls.gov/ooh/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25440157,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Developing Your Professional Identity and Network', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25440157}); ">
               Occuptional Outlook Handbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The OOH, from the Bureau of Labor Statistics, can help you find career information on duties, education and training, pay, and outlook for hundreds of occupations. Includes links to trade association.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25440241">
              <a id="link_25440241" href="http://www.onetonline.org/help/online/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25440241,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Developing Your Professional Identity and Network', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25440241}); ">
               O*NET OnLine
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               O*NET OnLine is an application that was created for the general public to provide broad access to the O*NET database of occupational information. O*NET OnLine offers a variety of search options and occupational data, while My Next Move is a streamlined application for students and job seekers. Both applications were developed for the U.S. Department of Labor by the National Center for O*NET Development.
               <br />
               <br />
               The O*NET database includes information on skills, abilities, knowledges, work activities, and interests associated with occupations. This information can be used to facilitate career exploration, vocational counseling, and a variety of human resources functions, such as developing job orders and position descriptions and aligning training with current workplace needs.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21975729">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21975729">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21975729">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative Career Encyclopedias
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21975729">
          <div id="boxatt21975729" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25440146">
              <a id="link_25440146" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/903178665?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25440146,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Developing Your Professional Identity and Network', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25440146}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Careers and Vocational Guidance
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier reference source for information about most all career areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21975669">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21975669">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21975669">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Job Search Websites
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21975669">
          <div id="boxatt21975669" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25440154">
              <a id="link_25440154" href="http://www.indeed.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25440154,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Developing Your Professional Identity and Network', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25440154}); ">
               Indeed
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "A huge aggregator of postings from across the Web, this site consolidates listings from many job boards in one place. It also compiles information from various company career pages and allows you to search locally or globally." --Robert Half
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25510231">
              <a id="link_25510231" href="http://www.my.jobs/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25510231,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Developing Your Professional Identity and Network', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25510231}); ">
               my.jobs (jobs.jobs)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "As the hub of the .JOBS Network of sites, My.jobs acts as a starting point to match those looking for a new job with those who want to hire them. By utilizing keywords and locations for the URL naming structure, the network strives to create a page that is relevant to all job seekers, regardless of location, occupation or specialty."
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22056646">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22056646">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22056646">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Additional Resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22056646">
          <div id="boxatt22056646" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25512573">
              <a id="link_25512573" href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QZw56lxPSe0SM7mFq0VOp9nC00z6zzM1ltmPn50MLSg/edit?usp=sharing" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25512573,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Developing Your Professional Identity and Network', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25512573}); ">
               Career attributes list 9:00 a.m.
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25512694">
              <a id="link_25512694" href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-EsuecEC7IKS2yQCdaPgE5epwhkWyLG1VgRpENzW-MA/edit?usp=sharing" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25512694,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Developing Your Professional Identity and Network', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25512694}); ">
               Career attributes list 2:00 p.m.
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>

          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21975671">
          <div id="boxatt21975671" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25440109">
              <a id="link_25440109" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25440109,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Developing Your Professional Identity and Network', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25440109}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   cssdropdown.startchrome("tabs12");
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   SpringTrack.trackPage({ 
                        st_type : content_config.hitsource, 
                        _st_gid : content_config.gid 
                    });
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
